name: workos-skills
description: Official WorkOS skills for AI coding agents — AuthKit, SSO, Directory Sync, RBAC, Vault, Migrations, and API references

metadata.description: WorkOS plugin with router + AuthKit framework skills for authentication, enterprise features, migrations, and API integration

plugins.name: workos
plugins.description: Identify which WorkOS skill to load based on the user's task — covers AuthKit, SSO, RBAC, migrations, and all API references.

plugins.name: workos-authkit-base
plugins.description: Architectural reference for WorkOS AuthKit integrations. Fetch README first for implementation details.

plugins.name: workos-authkit-nextjs
plugins.description: Integrate WorkOS AuthKit with Next.js App Router (13+). Server-side rendering required.

plugins.name: workos-authkit-react
plugins.description: Integrate WorkOS AuthKit with React single-page applications. Client-side only authentication. Use when the project is a React SPA without Next.js or React Router.

plugins.name: workos-authkit-react-router
plugins.description: Integrate WorkOS AuthKit with React Router applications. Supports v6 and v7 (Framework, Data, Declarative modes). Use when project uses react-router, react-router-dom, or mentions React Router authentication.

plugins.name: workos-authkit-tanstack-start
plugins.description: Integrate WorkOS AuthKit with TanStack Start applications. Full-stack TypeScript with server functions. Use when project uses TanStack Start, @tanstack/start, or vinxi.

plugins.name: workos-authkit-vanilla-js
plugins.description: Integrate WorkOS AuthKit with vanilla JavaScript applications. No framework required, browser-only. Use when project is plain HTML/JS, doesn't use React/Vue/etc, or mentions vanilla JavaScript authentication.
